tool_description: Get K-POP detailed songs, idol, group info!
name: K-POP
title: K-POP

api_list.name: girl-groups

optional_parameters.name: by
optional_parameters.description:
default: Stage Name
'by' parameter help you choose which info you would like to query based on.

Only the below values can be accepted for 'by'. 

- Group Name (default)
- Short Group Name
- Korean Name
- Date of Debut
- Company
- Members
- Original Members
- Fanclub Name
- Active

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
default: all there is
count limit for result

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
default: 0
offset for the result data

api_list.name: random girl-group
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://k-pop.p.rapidapi.com/girl-groups/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "k-pop.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Idols

optional_parameters.name: by
optional_parameters.description:
default: Stage Name
'by' parameter help you choose which info you would like to query based on.

Only the below values can be accepted for 'by'

-  Stage Name (default)
- Full Name
- Korean Name
- K. Stage Name
- Date of Birth
- Group
- Country
- Second Country
- Height
- Weight
- Birthplace
- Other Group
- Former Group
- Gender
- Position
- Instagram
- Twitter

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
default: all there is
count limit for result

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
default: 0
offset for the result data
